Ability.Description: Deals 786 to 869 Life damage. Increases the Cleric's Block by 5% for 8s. Requires a shield.

Rank.Description: Your Block is now derived from 50% of your Wisdom.
Your Block is now derived from 100% of your Wisdom.
Grants a Conviction every 6 seconds.
Grants a Conviction every 3 seconds.
Casting Hammer of Duty or Hammer of Faith applies a buff to you, increasing your Life damage by 2% for each Conviction consumed by the Hammer. Lasts 15s.
Reduces your damage taken by 1%.
Reduces your damage taken by 2%.
Reduces your damage taken by 3%.
Reduces your damage taken by 4%.
Reduces your damage taken by 5%.

Ability.Description: Enables Guard. Increases Base Health, Armor, and Resistances by 35%. Increases threat generation by 400%. Reduces damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with non-Justicar abilities by 40%.

Rank.Description: Increases your healing received by 5%.
Increases your healing received by 10%.

Ability.Description: Reduces threat generation by 50%. Increases damage and healing done by 5%. Causes casting Hammer of Duty or Hammer of Faith to apply a buff to the Cleric for 15s, increasing their damage by 2% for each Conviction consumed by the Hammer.

Rank.Description: Your Guard is now derived from 5% of your Wisdom. Your Dodge is now derived from 50% of your Intelligence.
Your Guard is now derived from 10% of your Wisdom. Your Dodge is now derived from 100% of your Intelligence.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Hammer of Duty and Hammer of Faith by 25%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Hammer of Duty and Hammer of Faith by 50%.
Increases the effect of Spell Power on your Hammer of Duty and Hammer of Faith by 75%.

Ability.Description: Interrupts the enemy and nearby enemies.

Rank.Description: Your regain 2% mana when you Block.
Your regain 4% mana when you Block.
Increases your Maximum Convictions by 1.
Increases your Maximum Convictions by 2.
Increases your Maximum Convictions by 3.
Increases your damage done with Strike of Judgment, Reckoning, Bolt of Radiance, and Doctrine of Authority by 15%.
Increases your damage done with Strike of Judgment, Reckoning, Bolt of Radiance, and Doctrine of Authority by 30%.
Increases your damage done with Strike of Judgment, Reckoning, Bolt of Radiance, and Doctrine of Authority by 45%.
Increases your Resistances by 10%. Reduces your damage taken from Spells by 5%.
Increases your Resistances by 20%. Reduces your damage taken from Spells by 10%.

Ability.Description: Brings the fallen ally back to life, restoring 100% health and 50% mana. Usable in combat.
Deals 402 to 444 Life damage. Must be used after the Cleric has Blocked.

Rank.Description: Overhealing you receive from your Doctrines generates an absorb shield equal to 2% of your Maximum Health. Can occur up to once every 10 seconds. Causes Doctrine of Bliss and Doctrine of Loyalty to consume up to 1 additional Conviction on cast, increasing the healing by 100% for each additional Conviction.

Overhealing you receive from your Doctrines generates an absorb shield equal to 4% of your Maximum Health. Can occur up to once every 10 seconds. Causes Doctrine of Bliss and Doctrine of Loyalty to consume up to 2 additional Convictions on cast, increasing the healing by 100% for each additional Conviction.

Overhealing you receive from your Doctrines generates an absorb shield equal to 6% of your Maximum Health. Can occur up to once every 10 seconds. Causes Doctrine of Bliss and Doctrine of Loyalty to consume up to 3 additional Convictions on cast, increasing the healing by 100% for each additional Conviction.
Increases your Block Absorption by 2%.
Increases your Block Absorption by 4%.

Ability.Description: Consumes all Convictions. Deals 120 to 133 Life damage for each Conviction to the enemy and up to 10 additional enemies.

AbilityRank.Description: Consumes all Convictions. Reduces damage taken by 2.86% per Conviction consumed. Lasts 4s.
Consumes all Convictions. Deals 120 to 133 Life damage for each Conviction to the enemy and up to 10 additional enemies.
Deals 874 to 965 Life damage. Increases movement speed by 15% for 10s.
Grants 7 Convictions. Increases damage and healing of the next 2 Conviction consuming abilities by 50%. Lasts 30s.
Consumes all Convictions. Deals 201 to 222 Life damage for each Conviction.
Deals 402 to 444 Life damage. Must be used after the Cleric has Blocked.

Causes damaging abilities to restore 35 to 39 health to the Cleric. Restores twice as much health when using single target Justicar abilities. Restores a quarter of that health when using non-Justicar area effect abilities. Restores 5% of that health when using non-channeled, non-Justicar, ground targeted area effect abilities. Generates no threat.
Causes Life-based damaging abilities to grant a Conviction for 30s.
Pulls up to 5 enemies to the Cleric, forcing them to attack the Cleric for 3s.
Enables Guard. Increases Base Health, Armor, and Resistances by 35%. Increases threat generation by 400%. Reduces damage done, healing done, and absorption granted with non-Justicar abilities by 40%.
Deals 1006 to 1112 Life damage.
Forces up to 10 nearby enemies to attack the Cleric for 3s.
Increases Maximum Health by 20%. Increases healing received by 50%. Lasts 10s.

Shields the ally, intercepting 50% of the damage they receive, and replacing the ally's Toughness with the Cleric's, for 6s. An ally can only be affected by a tank soul damage intercept up to once every 2 minutes.
Brings the fallen ally back to life, restoring 100% health and 50% mana. Usable in combat.
Deals 786 to 869 Life damage. Increases the Cleric's Block by 5% for 8s. Requires a shield.
Forces the enemy to attack the Cleric for 3s.
Damaging abilities generate additional threat based off of the Cleric's Endurance.
Stuns for 2s.
Restores 100% of the Cleric's health and 50% of the Cleric's Maximum Health to the target of the Cleric's Righteous Mandate.
Restores 101 to 112 health on up to 10 party or raid members. Consumes 1 Conviction.
Absorbs damage equal to 50% of the Cleric's Maximum Health. Lasts 10s.

Reduces threat generation by 50%. Increases damage and healing done by 5%. Causes casting Hammer of Duty or Hammer of Faith to apply a buff to the Cleric for 15s, increasing their damage by 2% for each Conviction consumed by the Hammer.
Interrupts the enemy and nearby enemies.
Deals 402 to 444 Life damage to up to 10 enemies within 7m of the Cleric.
Restores 373 to 412 health. Consumes 1 Conviction.
Causes weapon attacks to restore 10% mana to the Cleric. Blocks Conviction gains.
Deals 1412 Life damage over 15s, and reduces the Hit chance of the enemy by 5%. Spreads to up to 10 enemies if hit by the Cleric's Hammer of Faith.
Deals 670 to 740 Life damage.
Causes the Cleric's Salvation to heal the ally as well. Can only affect 1 ally. Lasts 1h.
Deals 1609 to 1778 Life damage. Restores 153 to 169 health to up to 5 party or raid members. Removes 1 Conviction.
